items.title: Higher-Order Programming in Wybe
items.subtitle: Master of Computer Science Research Project
desc: A research project completed in fulfilment of the Master of Computer Science
at the University of Melbourne. The project focused on the implementation of
higher-order programming in the Wybe language, and prompted the implementation
and optimisation of the manipulation of global variables within the compiler's
intermediate representation, LPVM.

items.title: Scalr.io
items.subtitle: UNIHACK'21 Project
desc: First prize winning UNIHACK'21 submission built by my team, Null Pointer.
Scalr.io offers a machine learning platform built for anyone to use, even
with no coding experience.

items.title: Airloom
items.subtitle: Computing and Software Systems Project
desc: University of Melbourne Bachelor of Science, Computing and Software Systems major, capstone project.
A family heirloom register.

items.title: Let Me Hoogle That For You
items.subtitle: LMHTFY
desc: A Hoogle clone of the 'Let Me Google That For You' site.

items.title: University of Melbourne Projects & Assignments
desc: A collection of assignments from my time as a student at the University of Melbourne.
Covering a range of subjects in both undergraduate and postgraduate levels.

items.title: Parsons Problem Automarker
items.subtitle: COMP10001 Automatic Marking Tool
desc: A tool to automatically mark Parsons problems built for COMP10001 Foundations of Computing.
The tool provides a grade and feedback for answers given a correct solution,
maximising the grade the student receives.

text: Type one of the following commands and press <enter>:

commands.name: help
desc: Displays this message.

commands.name: contact
desc: Displays my contact information with a link to my resume/CV.

commands.name: list
desc: Displays a list of portfolio items.

commands.name: search <query>
desc: Searches the portfolio items for relevant items.
<query> should be replaced with the search terms.
e.g. `search foo bar' searches for items with "foo" and "bar" in the title.

commands.name: credits
desc: Displays a list of credits.
